item.title: Overview Fp Technologies
item.description:
The goal of this article is to research the most popular FP based technologies. Maybe you will like and adapt some of them.

Disclaimer

I have to confess that after looking at projects and languages and theories behind them, I became adept of FP if not languages but definitely of practices.

A little bit of historical context

This engaging talk has a lot of references to historical moments: “Propositions as Types” by Philip Wadler - YouTube
